snippet: Representative Charles B. Rangel, who received the endorsement of Assemblyman Daniel J. O’Donnell on Friday, was defiant as he brushed off questions about his health.
abstract: Incumbent Rep Charles B Rangel receives the endorsement of Upper West Side Assemblyman Daniel J O'Donnell in primary race against fellow Democrat, New York State Senator Adriano Espaillat; Rangel defiantly brushes off questions about his health and vows to wage an aggressive re-election campaign. Photo (M)
lead_paragraph: He moved slowly and relied on a walker, but Representative Charles B. Rangel vowed on Friday to wage an energetic primary fight against an aggressive Democratic challenger. Mr. Rangel, who was holding his first news media appearance in weeks to receive the endorsement of Daniel J. O'Donnell, the Upper West Side assemblyman, brushed aside questions about his health and suggested that his ethics troubles were caused by his having been targeted by Republicans.

headline.main: Slowed Physically, Rangel Vows to Fight in Primary
